articles.title: These popular diets are best for heart health, according to the American Heart Association - CNN
articles.description: Here are the most effective diets to prevent heart disease, based on the latest evidence gathered by a scientific committee of the American Heart Association.
articles.content:
Heart disease is the leading killer of men and women worldwide, according to the World Health Organization, but there are ways to significantly reduce your risk.

articles.title: Leading cardiologists rank the 10 popular diets - Daily Mail
articles.description: The American Heart Association (AHA) scored 10 popular diets for their potential benefits in staving off heart disease. They were scored on whether the diet promoted consuming healthy foods
articles.content:
Diets that include healthy servings of meat are better for a person's heart than going vegan, a leading panel of cardiologists say.
